Hi Michael,
 
>> One thing that came to my mind while testing - is there a =
way to add
>> multiple ARCWriters to Heritrix, each with a seperate set of
=
>> DecideRules/Filters so I can pre-categorize my data easily?

> Should be=
 no problem adding multiple writers, each with its own rule
set.

I think t=
here is a problem about doing it - the webUI simply doesn't
allow me to do =
it. It just allows me to add one writer of each type,
adding multiple write=
rs of the same type is not possible.

This is why I happened to ask. I were=
 unsure if this limitation is
intentional - or just a shortcoming of the we=
bUI.

So I'll try if it breaks anything if I add them manually to the
order=
.xml (and it would be nice for sure if a post 1.10 version of
Heritrix woul=
d allow me to do it via the webUI, too)
